title: His Robot Girlfriend
description: Mike Smith's life was crap, living all alone, years after his wife had died and his children had grown up and moved away. Then he saw the commercial for the Daffodil. Far more than other robots, the Daffodil could become anything and everything he wanted it to be. Mike's life is about to change.The is available as a free ebook in multiple formats.
author: Wesley Allison
